experience.description: As a Full Stack Engineer Plugins team, I am responsible for building to create Lottie Integration to different platforms like Shopify, WordPress, Google Workspace and many more. Below I have listed most of my contributions to LottieFiles.
Worked here as Elastic Team member. Worked with different Clients from Distributed as a React Developer.
As a Full Stack Engineer here I am responsible of Managing and Developing several projects. Developing Mobile and Web Apps for International Clients USA, Canada, Australia, Italy, UK, UAE.

As a Frontend Developer my responsibilities were to create frontend for a SaaS based Student Information System which a web application. Gathering Client requirements and turning them into functional User Interface in React.
Full Stack Development, Team Management, Mentoring Junior Developers, Clients Engagement
Worked on a Hospice Product Full stack development. (JQuery, JavaScript, Html, Css, ASP.Net MVC, SQL)
Internship: Worked on Dentist Desktop Application, (C#, WPF)
